mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM product WHERE categoryid = #{categoryID} AND parentpid is null

SELECT c.CATEGORYID, p.PRODUCTID, p.PRODUCTNAME, p.PRODUCTPRICE, pm.PRODIMGURL FROM (SELECT cc.CATEGORYID FROM CATEGORY pc, CATEGORY cc WHERE pc.CATEGORYID = cc.PARENTID AND pc.CATEGORYID = #{categoryID}) c, PRODUCT p, PRODUCTIMAGE pm WHERE c.CATEGORYID = p.CATEGORYID AND p.PARENTPID IS NULL AND p.PRODUCTID = pm.PRODUCTID AND pm.ISTHUMBNAIL = 1 ORDER BY p.PRODUCTID DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT p.productid, p.productname, p.productprice, i.prodimgurl, p.categoryid FROM product p, productimage i WHERE p.productid = i.productid AND p.parentpid is null AND p.productname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
SELECT count(*) AS cnt FROM product WHERE parentpid is null AND productname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
